title: Ep97 Gal Pal Crimes
description: This week, the gals take stock of their friendships while discussing some not-so-friendly crimes. Topics include a pair of girlfriends with a sick side gig, a jilted wife with a murderous vendetta, and yet another obstacle to breaking that glass ceiling. Pour a glass of Winc's Chommie Cabernet Sauvignon, toast to your bestie, and tune in for Gal Pal Crimes.
